Feature.Name: Celestial
Feature.Text: The weapon is half the normal weight and inscribed with feathered wings, suns, and other symbols of good. Fiends find the item's presence repulsive.

MagicProperty.Name: Creator - Celestial
MagicProperty.Description: The weapon is half the normal weight and inscribed with feathered wings, suns, and other symbols of good. Fiends find the item's presence repulsive.
